message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hope you're okay with that.
That's not fair Alice! I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it. This is your last chance for a good deal.
Let's be reasonable.  I'll take 55%, you get 45%.  We can both walk away with a decent amount after inflation, and this avoids any more back and forth.
